query.statement:
SELECT /*+ USE_HASH(B A) */ A.MENU_CD, A.MENU_DATE, A.UPJANG, A.HALL_CD, A.MEAL , C.CODE_NAME AS MEAL_NAME, A.CORNER , D.CODE_NAME AS CORNER_NAME, A.MAJOR_DISH_INFO, A.MAJOR_DISH_INFO_NAME, A.EXPECT_MEAL_QTY, B.RECIPE_CD, B.RECIPE_NAME, NVL(B.RECIPE_COST_PRICE,0) AS RECIPE_COST_PRICE ,NVL(B.RECIPE_ORDER_YN,'N') AS RECIPE_ORDER_YN FROM ( SELECT (C.YMD||'-'||A.HALL_CD||A.MEAL||A.CORNER) AS MENU_CD, C.YMD AS MENU_DATE, A.UPJANG AS UPJANG, A.HALL_CD AS HALL_CD, A.MEAL AS MEAL, A.CORNER AS CORNER, B.CODE AS MAJOR_DISH_INFO, B.CODE_NAME AS MAJOR_DISH_INFO_NAME, NVL(D.EXPECT_MEAL_QTY,0) AS EXPECT_MEAL_QTY, B.SORT_SEQ AS SORT_SEQ FROM FSA_HALL_DTL A, SCC_COMMON_CODE B, SCC_COPY_YMD C, FSM_REAL_MENU_MST D WHERE A.UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND A.HALL_CD = #HALL_CD#
AND A.CORNER = #CORNER#
AND A.MEAL = #MEAL#
AND B.GROUP_CODE = 'FS0032' AND C.YMD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# AND A.UPJANG = D.UPJANG AND A.HALL_CD = D.HALL_CD AND A.MEAL = D.MEAL AND A.CORNER = D.CORNER AND C.YMD = D.MENU_DATE AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ) A, ( SELECT MENU_CD , UPJANG , MAJOR_DISH_INFO , RECIPE_CD, RECIPE_NAME, 0 AS RECIPE_COST_PRICE ,( SELECT ORDER_YN AS RECIPE_ORDER_YN FROM FSM_REAL_RECIPE_ITEM WHERE MENU_CD=FSM_REAL_RECIPE_MST.MENU_CD AND RECIPE_CD=FSM_REAL_RECIPE_MST.RECIPE_CD AND UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND ROWNUM <=1) AS RECIPE_ORDER_YN FROM FSM_REAL_RECIPE_MST WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND MENU_CD BETWEEN #START_DATE# AND #END_DATE# ||'9' ) B, SCC_COMMON_CODE C, SCC_COMMON_CODE D WHERE A.UPJANG = B.UPJANG(+) AND A.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD(+) AND A.MAJOR_DISH_INFO = B.MAJOR_DISH_INFO(+) AND A.MEAL = C.CODE AND A.CORNER = D.CODE AND C.GROUP_CODE = 'FS0023' AND D.GROUP_CODE = 'FS0022' /*ORDER BY A.MENU_DATE, A.MEAL, A.CORNER, A.MAJOR_DISH_INFO*/ ORDER BY A.MENU_DATE, A.MEAL, A.CORNER, A.SORT_SEQ
